name: Ananya Sharan
title: Bachelor of Management Studies Student
about: A strong background in management and marketing is demonstrated, showcasing skills in strategic planning and execution. Leadership roles in student organizations have been successfully undertaken, reflecting a commitment to organizational success.

bullets: Converted multiple clients and managed operational processes to drive efficiency and results
Coordinated with different departments to improve clients engagement and retention
Connected with foreign clients to generate leads
Contributed to a 10% boost in engagement by assisting in marketing strategy development
Conducted market research to identify customer needs and engaged clients and prospects
Supported the development of promotional campaigns and sales presentations
Screened over 150 resumes and coordinated interviews during recruitment drives
Maintained and updated employee records for 50 employees, ensuring data accuracy and confidentiality
Supported onboarding activities, including preparation of joining kits and documentation
Optimized marketing campaigns, improving ROI by 15% using Google Analytics insights
